channel.title: Android on Jaigarage
channel.description: Recent content in Android on Jaigarage

item.title: ADB CLI: Connect and Debug Android Devices
item.description: Android Debug Bridge (ADB) is a versatile command-line tool that lets you communicate with an Android-powered device. ADB provides various device actions, such as installing and debugging apps, and it offers access to a Unix shell that you can use to run commands on a device.

item.title: Mobile Screencast: Android to OBS via RTMP & IP Camera
item.description: Mobile screencasting allows you to display your mobile device’s screen on another device, such as a computer, often for recording or live streaming. This is particularly useful for creating tutorials, showcasing mobile games, delivering presentations, or simply mirroring your phone’s display to a larger screen.
